crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_type != 'acdc_stat' || doc.pvt_deleted ) return; emit(doc.pvt_created, {'recorded_at':doc.recorded_at, 'queues':doc.queues, 'agents':doc.agents}); }

stats_per_queue.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_type != 'acdc_stat' || doc.pvt_deleted ) return; for (q in doc.queues) { emit(doc.queues[q][0], doc.queues[q][1]); } }
